Name: YANKAI'S PEAK.
About the game: YANKAI'S PEAK. is a love letter to PYRAMIDS . A colorful PYRAMID -pushing puzzle game about the beauty and joy of being a sentient blue PYRAMID . Pretty cool gameplay. Over 130 handcrafted levels. 7 PARTs each exploring a unique multifaceted mechanic. Meditative sound design. A sick intro. A game by Kenny Sun. Music by JACK+JIM. (YANKAI is pronounced YEN - KYE).
Meta Title: YANKAI'S PEAK.: Jul 13, 2017, Kenny Sun and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on YANKAI'S PEAK.? Check out the release date (Jul 13, 2017), developer insights from Kenny Sun, and a complete game summary.
